name: christmas-community
description: Christmas Community is a self-hosted advent calendar and holiday activity tracker platform. It includes user submissions, countdowns, and decorated layouts designed for hosting community-driven holiday content.
features: Advent Calendar: Digital advent calendar for holiday activities. Festive countdown.
User Submissions: Community-driven holiday content. Collaborative celebration.
Countdown Timers: Track days until holidays and events. Build excitement.
Decorated Layouts: Festive themes and designs. Holiday spirit.
Community Platform: Host holiday activities for groups. Shared traditions.
Self-Hosted: Run your own holiday community. Complete control.
